text: I My rasskazali tebe, o prorok, raznyye istorii iz vzaimootnosheniy predshestvuyushchikh poslannikov s ikh narodami, chtoby ukrepit' tvoyo serdtse, chto pomozhet tebe terpet' trudnosti prorocheskoy missii. I v etikh vestyakh yavilas' k tebe istina, k kotoroy ty prizyvayesh', kak prizyvali k ney predshestvuyushchiye poslanniki: poklonyat'sya tol'ko Allakhu i otkazat'sya ot togo, chto mozhet vyzvat' Yego gnev. V nikh takzhe nazidaniya i napominaniye veruyushchim, chto ukreplyayet ikh veru, i tem, kotoryye sklonny k vere, chtoby bystreye uverovali
